Body:
"""Test create_rdf_group."""
with mock.patch.object(self.replication, 'create_resource') as mock_create:
    self.replication.create_rdf_group(local_director_port_list=self.data.
        local_rdf_ports, local_rdfg_number=1, remote_array_id=self.data.
        remote_array, remote_rdfg_number=1, remote_director_port_list=self.
        data.remote_rdf_ports, label='test')
    mock_create.assert_called_once()
